original: Majjhima Nikāya 81
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Ghaṭikārasutta
analyzed: ghaṭikārasutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosalesu cārikaṁ carati mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā kosalesu cārikam carati mahatā bhikkhu saṅghena saddhi

original: Atha kho bhagavā maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṁ padese sitaṁ pātvākāsi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā maggā okkamma aññatarasmin padese sitam pātvā akāsi

original: Atha kho āyasmato ānandassa etadahosi:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmataḥ ānandassa etat ahosi

original: “ko nu kho hetu, ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa pātukammāya?
analyzed: kaḥ nu kho hetu kaḥ paccayaḥ bhagavato sitassa pātukammāya

original: Na akāraṇena tathāgatā sitaṁ pātukarontī”ti.
analyzed: na akāraṇena tathāgatāḥ sitam pātukaronti iti

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando ekaṁsaṁ cīvaraṁ katvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmai ānandaḥ ekasam cīvaram katvā yena bhagavā tena añjalim paṇāmetvā bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa pātukammāya?
analyzed: kaḥ nu kho bhante hetu kaḥ paccayaḥ bhagavato sitassa pātukammāya

original: Na akāraṇena tathāgatā sitaṁ pātukarontī”ti.
analyzed: na akāraṇena tathāgatāḥ sitam pātukaronti iti

original: “Bhūtapubbaṁ, ānanda, imasmiṁ padese vegaḷiṅgaṁ nāma gāmanigamo ahosi iddho ceva phīto ca bahujano ākiṇṇamanusso.
analyzed: bhūta pubbaḥ ānanda imasmin padese vegaḷiṅgam nāma gāma nigamaḥ ahosi iddhaḥ ca iva phītaḥ ca bahu janaḥ ākiṇṇa manusso

original: Vegaḷiṅgaṁ kho, ānanda, gāmanigamaṁ kassapo bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho upanissāya vihāsi.
analyzed: vegaḷiṅgam kho ānanda gāma nigamam kassapaḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ upanissāya vihāsi

original: Idha sudaṁ, ānanda, kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa ārāmo ahosi.
analyzed: idha suda ānanda kassapassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa ārāmaḥ ahosi

original: Idha sudaṁ, ānanda, kassapo bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho nisinnako bhikkhusaṅghaṁ ovadatī”ti.
analyzed: idha sudaḥ ānanda kassapaḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ nisinnakaḥ bhikkhu saṅgham ovadati iti

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando catugguṇaṁ saṅghāṭiṁ paññapetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai ānandaḥ catugguṇam saṅghāṭim paññapetvā bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “tena hi, bhante, bhagavā nisīdatu ettha.
analyzed: tena hi bhante bhagavā nisīdatu ettha

original: Ayaṁ bhūmipadeso dvīhi arahantehi sammāsambuddhehi paribhutto bhavissatī”ti.
analyzed: ayam bhūmi padesaḥ dvīhi arahantehi sammāsambuddhehi paribhuttaḥ bhavissati iti

original: Nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsane.
analyzed: nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsane

original: Nisajja kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: nisajja khalu bhagavān āyasmantam ānandam āmantesi

original: “Bhūtapubbaṁ, ānanda, imasmiṁ padese vegaḷiṅgaṁ nāma gāmanigamo ahosi iddho ceva phīto ca bahujano ākiṇṇamanusso.
analyzed: bhūta pubbaḥ ānanda imasmin padese vegaḷiṅgam nāma gāma nigamaḥ ahosi iddhaḥ ca iva phītaḥ ca bahu janaḥ ākiṇṇa manusso

original: Vegaḷiṅgaṁ kho, ānanda, gāmanigamaṁ kassapo bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho upanissāya vihāsi.
analyzed: vegaḷiṅgam kho ānanda gāma nigamam kassapaḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ upanissāya vihāsi

original: Idha sudaṁ, ānanda, kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa ārāmo ahosi.
analyzed: idha suda ānanda kassapassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa ārāmaḥ ahosi

original: Idha sudaṁ, ānanda, kassapo bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho nisinnako bhikkhusaṅghaṁ ovadati.
analyzed: idha sudaḥ ānanda kassapaḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ nisinnakaḥ bhikkhu saṅghaṃ ovadati

original: Vegaḷiṅge kho, ānanda, gāmanigame ghaṭikāro nāma kumbhakāro kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa upaṭṭhāko ahosi aggupaṭṭhāko.
analyzed: vegaḷiṅge kho ānanda gāma nigame ghaṭikāraḥ nāma kumbhakāraḥ kassapassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa upaṭṭhākaḥ ahosi aggupaṭṭhāko

original: Ghaṭikārassa kho, ānanda, kumbhakārassa jotipālo nāma māṇavo sahāyo ahosi piyasahāyo.
analyzed: ghaṭikārassa kho ānanda kumbhakārassa jotipālaḥ nāma māṇavo sahāyaḥ ahosi piya sahāyaḥ

original: Atha kho, ānanda, ghaṭikāro kumbhakāro jotipālaṁ māṇavaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha khalu ānanda ghaṭikāraḥ kumbhakāraḥ jotipālam māṇavam āmantesi

original: ‘āyāma, samma jotipāla, kassapaṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamissāma.
analyzed: āyāma samma jotipāla kassapam bhagavantam arahantam sammāsambuddham dassanāya upasaṅkamissāma

original: Sādhusammatañhi me tassa bhagavato dassanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassā’ti.
analyzed: sādhu sammatam hi me tassa bhagavataḥ dassanam arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, ānanda, jotipālo māṇavo ghaṭikāraṁ kumbhakāraṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte ānanda jotipālaḥ māṇavaḥ ghaṭikāram kumbhakāram etat avoca

original: ‘alaṁ, samma ghaṭikāra.
analyzed: ala samma ghaṭikāra

original: Kiṁ pana tena muṇḍakena samaṇakena diṭṭhenā’ti?
analyzed: kim pana tena muṇḍakena samaṇakena diṭṭhena ati

original: Dutiyampi kho, ānanda …pe…
analyzed: dutiyam pi kho ānanda pe

original: tatiyampi kho, ānanda, ghaṭikāro kumbhakāro jotipālaṁ māṇavaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: tatiyam pi kho ānanda ghaṭikāraḥ kumbhakāraḥ jotipālam māṇavam etat avoca

original: ‘āyāma, samma jotipāla, kassapaṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamissāma.
analyzed: āyāma samma jotipāla kassapam bhagavantam arahantam sammāsambuddham dassanāya upasaṅkamissāma

original: Sādhusammatañhi me tassa bhagavato dassanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassā’ti.
analyzed: sādhu sammatam hi me tassa bhagavataḥ dassanam arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa ati

original: Tatiyampi kho, ānanda, jotipālo māṇavo ghaṭikāraṁ kumbhakāraṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: tatiyam pi kho ānanda jotipālaḥ māṇavaḥ ghaṭikāram kumbhakāram etat avoca

original: ‘alaṁ, samma ghaṭikāra.
analyzed: ala samma ghaṭikāra

original: Kiṁ pana tena muṇḍakena samaṇakena diṭṭhenā’ti?
analyzed: kim pana tena muṇḍakena samaṇakena diṭṭhena ati

original: ‘Tena hi, samma jotipāla, sottisināniṁ ādāya nadiṁ gamissāma sināyitun’ti.
analyzed: tena hi samma jotipāla sotti sinānim ādāya nadim gamissāma sināyitunti

original: ‘Evaṁ, sammā’ti kho, ānanda, jotipālo māṇavo ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa paccassosi.
analyzed: eva sammā iti kho ānanda jotipālaḥ māṇavaḥ ghaṭi kārassa kumbhakārassa paccassosi

original: Atha kho, ānanda, ghaṭikāro ca kumbhakāro jotipālo ca māṇavo sottisināniṁ ādāya nadiṁ agamaṁsu sināyituṁ.
analyzed: atha khalu ānanda ghaṭikāraḥ ca kumbhakāraḥ jotipālaḥ ca māṇavaḥ ādāya nadim agamasu sināyitu

original: Atha kho, ānanda, ghaṭikāro kumbhakāro jotipālaṁ māṇavaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha khalu ānanda ghaṭikāraḥ kumbhakāraḥ jotipālam māṇavam āmantesi

original: ‘ayaṁ, samma jotipāla, kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa avidūre ārāmo.
analyzed: aya samma jotipāla kassapassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa avidūre ārāmaḥ

original: Āyāma, samma jotipāla, kassapaṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamissāma.
analyzed: āyāma samma jotipāla kassapam bhagavantam arahantam sammāsambuddham dassanāya upasaṅkamissāma

original: Sādhusammatañhi me tassa bhagavato dassanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassā’ti.
analyzed: sādhu sammatam hi me tassa bhagavataḥ dassanam arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, ānanda, jotipālo māṇavo ghaṭikāraṁ kumbhakāraṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte ānanda jotipālaḥ māṇavaḥ ghaṭikāram kumbhakāram etat avoca

original: ‘alaṁ, samma ghaṭikāra.
analyzed: ala samma ghaṭikāra

original: Kiṁ pana tena muṇḍakena samaṇakena diṭṭhenā’ti?
analyzed: kim pana tena muṇḍakena samaṇakena diṭṭhena ati

original: Dutiyampi kho, ānanda …pe…
analyzed: dutiyam pi kho ānanda pe

original: tatiyampi kho, ānanda, ghaṭikāro kumbhakāro jotipālaṁ māṇavaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: tatiyam pi kho ānanda ghaṭikāraḥ kumbhakāraḥ jotipālam māṇavam etat avoca

original: ‘ayaṁ, samma jotipāla, kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa avidūre ārāmo.
analyzed: aya samma jotipāla kassapassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa avidūre ārāmaḥ

original: Āyāma, samma jotipāla, kassapaṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamissāma.
analyzed: āyāma samma jotipāla kassapam bhagavantam arahantam sammāsambuddham dassanāya upasaṅkamissāma

original: Sādhusammatañhi me tassa bhagavato dassanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassā’ti.
analyzed: sādhu sammatam hi me tassa bhagavataḥ dassanam arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa ati

original: Tatiyampi kho, ānanda, jotipālo māṇavo ghaṭikāraṁ kumbhakāraṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: tatiyam pi kho ānanda jotipālaḥ māṇavaḥ ghaṭikāram kumbhakāram etat avoca

original: ‘alaṁ, samma ghaṭikāra.
analyzed: ala samma ghaṭikāra

original: Kiṁ pana tena muṇḍakena samaṇakena diṭṭhenā’ti?
analyzed: kim pana tena muṇḍakena samaṇakena diṭṭhena ati

original: Atha kho, ānanda, ghaṭikāro kumbhakāro jotipālaṁ māṇavaṁ ovaṭṭikāyaṁ parāmasitvā etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu ānanda ghaṭikāraḥ kumbhakāraḥ jotipālam māṇavam ovaṭṭi kāyam parāmasitvā etat avoca

original: ‘ayaṁ, samma jotipāla, kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa avidūre ārāmo.
analyzed: aya samma jotipāla kassapassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa avidūre ārāmaḥ

original: Āyāma, samma jotipāla, kassapaṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamissāma.
analyzed: āyāma samma jotipāla kassapam bhagavantam arahantam sammāsambuddham dassanāya upasaṅkamissāma

original: Sādhusammatañhi me tassa bhagavato dassanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassā’ti.
analyzed: sādhu sammatam hi me tassa bhagavataḥ dassanam arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa ati

original: Atha kho, ānanda, jotipālo māṇavo ovaṭṭikaṁ vinivaṭṭetvā ghaṭikāraṁ kumbhakāraṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu ānanda jotipālaḥ māṇavaḥ ovaṭṭikam vinivaṭṭetvā ghaṭikāram kumbhakāram etat avoca

original: ‘alaṁ, samma ghaṭikāra.
analyzed: ala samma ghaṭikāra

original: Kiṁ pana tena muṇḍakena samaṇakena diṭṭhenā’ti?
analyzed: kim pana tena muṇḍakena samaṇakena diṭṭhena ati

original: Atha kho, ānanda, ghaṭikāro kumbhakāro jotipālaṁ māṇavaṁ sīsaṁnhātaṁ kesesu parāmasitvā etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu ānanda ghaṭikāraḥ kumbhakāraḥ jotipālam māṇavam sīsa nhātam kesesu parāmasitvā etat avoca

original: ‘ayaṁ, samma jotipāla, kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa avidūre ārāmo.
analyzed: aya samma jotipāla kassapassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa avidūre ārāmaḥ

original: Āyāma, samma jotipāla, kassapaṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamissāma.
analyzed: āyāma samma jotipāla kassapam bhagavantam arahantam sammāsambuddham dassanāya upasaṅkamissāma

original: Sādhusammatañhi me tassa bhagavato dassanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassā’ti.
analyzed: sādhu sammatam hi me tassa bhagavataḥ dassanam arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa ati

original: Atha kho, ānanda, jotipālassa māṇavassa etadahosi:
analyzed: atha kho ānanda jotipālassa māṇavassa etat ahosi

original: ‘acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho.
analyzed: acchariyam vata bho abbhutam vata bho

original: Yatra hi nāmāyaṁ ghaṭikāro kumbhakāro ittarajacco samāno amhākaṁ sīsaṁnhātānaṁ kesesu parāmasitabbaṁ maññissati;
analyzed: yatra hi nāma ayam ghaṭikāraḥ kumbhakāraḥ ittarajaccaḥ samānaḥ amhākam sīsa nhātānam kesesu parāmasitabbam maññissati

original: na vatidaṁ kira orakaṁ maññe bhavissatī’ti;
analyzed: na vatidam kira orakam maññe bhavissati iti

original: ghaṭikāraṁ kumbhakāraṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ghaṭikāram kumbhakāram etat avoca

original: ‘yāvatādohipi, samma ghaṭikārā’ti?
analyzed: samma

original: ‘Yāvatādohipi, samma jotipāla.
analyzed: samma joti pāla

original: Tathā hi pana me sādhusammataṁ tassa bhagavato dassanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassā’ti.
analyzed: tathā hi pana me sādhu sammatam tassa bhagavataḥ dassanam arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa ati

original: ‘Tena hi, samma ghaṭikāra, muñca; gamissāmā’ti.
analyzed: tena hi samma ghaṭikāra muñca gamissāma ati

original: Atha kho, ānanda, ghaṭikāro ca kumbhakāro jotipālo ca māṇavo yena kassapo bhagavā
analyzed: atha kho ānanda ghaṭikāraḥ ca kumbhakāraḥ jotipālaḥ ca māṇavaḥ yena kassapaḥ bhagavā

original: arahaṁ sammāsambuddho tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā ghaṭikāro kumbhakāro kassapaṁ
analyzed: araham sammāsambuddho tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā ghaṭikāraḥ kumbhakāraḥ kassapa

original: bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Jotipālo pana
analyzed: bhagavantam arahantam sammāsambuddham abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi jotipālaḥ pana

original: māṇavo kassapena bhagavatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena saddhiṁ sammodi. Sammodanīyaṁ
analyzed: māṇavaḥ kassapena bhagavatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena saddhim sammodi sammodanīya

original: kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho, ānanda, ghaṭikāro kumbhakāro kassapaṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho ānanda ghaṭikāraḥ kumbhakāraḥ kassapam bhagavantam arahantam sammāsambuddham etat avoca

original: ‘ayaṁ me, bhante, jotipālo māṇavo sahāyo piyasahāyo.
analyzed: ayam me bhante jotipālaḥ māṇavaḥ sahāyaḥ piya sahāyaḥ

original: Imassa bhagavā dhammaṁ desetū’ti.
analyzed: imassa bhagavā dhammam desetu uti

original: Atha kho, ānanda, kassapo bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho ghaṭikārañca kumbhakāraṁ jotipālañca māṇavaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
analyzed: atha kho ānanda kassapaḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ ghaṭikārañca kumbhakāram jotipālañca māṇavam dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahasesi

original: Atha kho, ānanda, ghaṭikāro ca kumbhakāro jotipālo ca māṇavo kassapena bhagavatā
analyzed: atha kho ānanda ghaṭikāraḥ ca kumbhakāraḥ jotipālo ca māṇavaḥ kassapena bhagavatā

original: arahatā sammāsambuddhena dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahaṁsitā
analyzed: arahatā sammāsambuddhena dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahasitā

original: kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā
analyzed: kassapassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa bhāsitam abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāya āsanā

original: kassapaṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkamiṁsu.
analyzed: kassapam bhagavantam arahantam sammāsambuddham abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā pakkamisu

original: Atha kho, ānanda, jotipālo māṇavo ghaṭikāraṁ kumbhakāraṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu ānanda jotipālaḥ māṇavaḥ ghaṭikāram kumbhakāram etat avoca

original: ‘imaṁ nu tvaṁ, samma ghaṭikāra, dhammaṁ suṇanto atha ca pana agārasmā anagāriyaṁ na pabbajissasī’ti?
analyzed: imam nu tva samma ghaṭikāra dhammam suṇantaḥ atha ca pana agārasmai anagāriyam na pabbajissasi iti

original: ‘Nanu maṁ, samma jotipāla, jānāsi, andhe jiṇṇe mātāpitaro posemī’ti?
analyzed: nanu ma samma jotipāla jānāsi andhe jiṇṇe mātā pitaraḥ posemi iti

original: ‘Tena hi, samma ghaṭikāra, ahaṁ agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajissāmī’ti.
analyzed: tena hi samma ghaṭikāra aham agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajissāmi iti

original: Atha kho, ānanda, ghaṭikāro ca kumbhakāro jotipālo ca māṇavo yena kassapo bhagavā
analyzed: atha kho ānanda ghaṭikāraḥ ca kumbhakāraḥ jotipālaḥ ca māṇavaḥ yena kassapaḥ bhagavā

original: arahaṁ sammāsambuddho tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā kassapaṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ
analyzed: araham sammāsambuddhaḥ tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā kassapam bhagavantam arahanta

original: sammāsambuddhaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho, ānanda, ghaṭikāro
analyzed: sammāsambuddham abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdisu ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho ānanda ghaṭikāraḥ

original: kumbhakāro kassapaṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: kumbhakāraḥ kassapam bhagavantam arahantam sammāsambuddham etat avoca

original: ‘ayaṁ me, bhante, jotipālo māṇavo sahāyo piyasahāyo.
analyzed: ayam me bhante jotipālaḥ māṇavaḥ sahāyaḥ piya sahāyaḥ

original: Imaṁ bhagavā pabbājetū’ti.
analyzed: imam bhagavā pabbājetu uti

original: Alattha kho, ānanda, jotipālo māṇavo kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa santike pabbajjaṁ, alattha upasampadaṁ.
analyzed: alattha kho ānanda jotipālaḥ māṇavaḥ kassapassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa santike pabbajja alattha upasampada

original: Atha kho, ānanda, kassapo bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho acirūpasampanne jotipāle māṇave aḍḍhamāsupasampanne vegaḷiṅge yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā yena bārāṇasī tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho ānanda kassapaḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ acira upasampanne jotipāle māṇave aḍḍha māsa upasampanne vegaḷiṅge yathābhirantam viharitvā yena bārāṇasī tena cārikam pakkāmi

original: Anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena bārāṇasī tadavasari.
analyzed: anupubbena cārikam caramānaḥ yena bārāṇasī tat avasari

original: Tatra sudaṁ, ānanda, kassapo bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho bārāṇasiyaṁ viharati isipatane migadāye.
analyzed: tatra sudaḥ ānanda kassapaḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ bārāṇasiyam viharati isipatane migadāye

original: Assosi kho, ānanda, kikī kāsirājā: ‘kassapo kira bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho bārāṇasiṁ anuppatto bārāṇasiyaṁ viharati isipatane migadāye’ti.
analyzed: assosi kho ānanda kikī kāsi rājā kassapaḥ kira bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ bārāṇasim anuppattaḥ bārāṇasiyam viharati isipatane migadāya iti

original: Atha kho, ānanda, kikī kāsirājā bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni yojāpetvā bhadraṁ yānaṁ
analyzed: atha khalu ānanda kikī kāsi rājā bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni yoja a petvā bhadram yāna

original: abhiruhitvā bhadrehi bhadrehi yānehi bārāṇasiyā niyyāsi mahaccarājānubhāvena kassapaṁ
analyzed: abhiruhitvā bhadrehi bhadrehi yānehi bārāṇasiyāḥ niyyāsi mahacca rājā anubhāvena kassapa

original: bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ dassanāya.
analyzed: bhagavantam arahantam sammāsambuddham dassanāya

original: Yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi yānena gantvā yānā paccorohitvā pattikova yena kassapo bhagavā
analyzed: yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi yānena gantvā yānā paccorohitvā pattikā uva yena kassapaḥ bhagavā

original: arahaṁ sammāsambuddho tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā kassapaṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ
analyzed: araham sammāsambuddhaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā kassapam bhagavantam arahanta

original: sammāsambuddhaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: sammāsambuddham abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho, ānanda, kikiṁ kāsirājānaṁ kassapo bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnam kho ānanda kikim kāsi rājānam kassapaḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahasesi

original: Atha kho, ānanda, kikī kāsirājā kassapena bhagavatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena dhammiyā
analyzed: atha kho ānanda kikī kāsi rājā kassapena bhagavatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena dhammiyā

original: kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito kassapaṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ
analyzed: kathāya sandassitaḥ samādapitaḥ samuttejitaḥ sampahasitaḥ kassapam bhagavantam arahanta

original: sammāsambuddhaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: sammāsambuddham etat avoca

original: ‘adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṁ saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghenā’ti.
analyzed: adhivāsetu me bhante bhagavā svātanāya bhattam saddhim bhikkhu saṅghena ati

original: Adhivāsesi kho, ānanda, kassapo bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho tuṇhībhāvena.
analyzed: adhivāsesi kho ānanda kassapaḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ tuṇhībhāvena

original: Atha kho, ānanda, kikī kāsirājā kassapassa bhagavato sammāsambuddhassa adhivāsanaṁ
analyzed: atha kho ānanda kikī kāsi rājā kassapassa bhagavataḥ sammāsambuddhassa adhivāsana

original: viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā kassapaṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
analyzed: viditvā uṭṭhāya āsanā kassapam bhagavantam arahantam sammāsambuddham abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā pakkāmi

original: Atha kho, ānanda, kikī kāsirājā tassā rattiyā accayena sake nivesane paṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ
analyzed: atha kho ānanda kikī kāsi rājā tassāḥ rattiyāḥ accayena sake nivesane paṇītam khādanīya

original: bhojanīyaṁ paṭiyādāpetvā paṇḍupuṭakassa sālino vigatakāḷakaṁ anekasūpaṁ anekabyañjanaṁ,
analyzed: bhojanīyam paṭiyādāpetvā paṇḍupuṭakassa sālinaḥ vigata kāḷakam aneka sūpam aneka byañjana

original: kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa kālaṁ ārocāpesi:
analyzed: kassapassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa kālam ārocāpesi

original: ‘kālo, bhante, niṭṭhitaṁ bhattan’ti.
analyzed: kālaḥ bhante niṭṭhitam bhattanti

original: Atha kho, ānanda, kassapo bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā
analyzed: atha kho ānanda kassapaḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā

original: pattacīvaramādāya yena kikissa kāsirañño nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte
analyzed: patta cīvaram ādāya yena kikissa kāsiraññaḥ nivesanam tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā paññatte

original: āsane nisīdi saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghena.
analyzed: āsane nisīdi saddhim bhikkhu saṅghena

original: Atha kho, ānanda, kikī kāsirājā buddhappamukhaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresi.
analyzed: atha kho ānanda kikī kāsi rājā buddha ppamukham bhikkhu saṅgham paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresi

original: Atha kho, ānanda, kikī kāsirājā kassapaṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ bhuttāviṁ onītapattapāṇiṁ aññataraṁ nīcaṁ āsanaṁ gahetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho ānanda kikī kāsi rājā kassapam bhagavantam arahantam sammāsambuddham bhuttāvim onīta patta pāṇim aññataram nīcam āsanam gahetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho, ānanda, kikī kāsirājā kassapaṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu ānanda kikī kāsi rājā kassapam bhagavantam arahantam sammāsambuddham etat avoca

original: ‘adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṁ vassāvāsaṁ;
analyzed: adhivāsetu me bhante bhagavā bārāṇasiyam vassa āvāsa

original: evarūpaṁ saṅghassa upaṭṭhānaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
analyzed: evarūpam saṅghassa upaṭṭhānam bhavissati iti

original: ‘Alaṁ, mahārāja.
analyzed: ala mahā rāja

original: Adhivuttho me vassāvāso’ti.
analyzed: adhivutthaḥ me vassāvāsaḥ ti

original: Dutiyampi kho, ānanda …
analyzed: dutiyam pi kho ānanda

original: tatiyampi kho, ānanda, kikī kāsirājā kassapaṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: tatiyam pi khalu ānanda kikī kāsi rājā kassapam bhagavantam arahantam sammāsambuddham etat avoca

original: ‘adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṁ vassāvāsaṁ;
analyzed: adhivāsetu me bhante bhagavā bārāṇasiyam vassa āvāsa

original: evarūpaṁ saṅghassa upaṭṭhānaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
analyzed: evarūpam saṅghassa upaṭṭhānam bhavissati iti

original: ‘Alaṁ, mahārāja.
analyzed: ala mahā rāja

original: Adhivuttho me vassāvāso’ti.
analyzed: adhivutthaḥ me vassāvāsaḥ ti

original: Atha kho, ānanda, kikissa kāsirañño ‘na me kassapo bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho adhivāseti bārāṇasiyaṁ vassāvāsan’ti ahudeva aññathattaṁ, ahu domanassaṁ.
analyzed: atha kho ānanda kikissa kāsi raññaḥ na me kassapaḥ bhagavā arahan sammāsambuddhaḥ adhivāseti bārāṇasiyam

original: Atha kho, ānanda, kikī kāsirājā kassapaṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu ānanda kikī kāsi rājā kassapam bhagavantam arahantam sammāsambuddham etat avoca

original: ‘atthi nu kho, bhante, añño koci mayā upaṭṭhākataro’ti?
analyzed: atthi nu kho bhante añño koci mayā upaṭṭhākataro ti

original: ‘Atthi, mahārāja, vegaḷiṅgaṁ nāma gāmanigamo.
analyzed: atthi mahā rāja vegaḷiṅgam nāma gāma nigamaḥ

original: Tattha ghaṭikāro nāma kumbhakāro;
analyzed: tattha ghaṭikāraḥ nāma kumbhakāro

original: so me upaṭṭhāko aggupaṭṭhāko.
analyzed: saḥ me upaṭṭhākaḥ aggupaṭṭhāko

original: Tuyhaṁ kho pana, mahārāja, na me kassapo bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho adhivāseti bārāṇasiyaṁ vassāvāsanti attheva aññathattaṁ, atthi domanassaṁ.
analyzed: tuyham kho pana mahā rāja na me kassapaḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ adhivāseti bārāṇasiyam attha iva aññathatta atthi domanassa

original: Tayidaṁ ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa natthi ca na ca bhavissati.
analyzed: tayidam ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa natthi ca na ca bhavissati

original: Ghaṭikāro kho, mahārāja, kumbhakāro buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gato, dhammaṁ saraṇaṁ gato, saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gato.
analyzed: ghaṭikāraḥ kho mahā rāja kumbhakāraḥ buddham saraṇam gataḥ dhammam saraṇam gataḥ saṅgham saraṇam gataḥ

original: Ghaṭikāro kho, mahārāja, kumbhakāro pāṇātipātā paṭivirato, adinnādānā paṭivirato, kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato, musāvādā paṭivirato, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato.
analyzed: ghaṭikāraḥ kho mahā rāja kumbhakāraḥ pāṇa atipātā paṭivirataḥ adinna ādānā paṭivirataḥ kāmesu micchā ācārā paṭivirataḥ musā vādā paṭivirataḥ surā meraya majja pamāda ṭṭhānā paṭivirataḥ

original: Ghaṭikāro kho, mahārāja, kumbhakāro buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato, dhamme aveccappasādena samannāgato, saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgato, ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato.
analyzed: ghaṭikāraḥ kho mahā rāja kumbhakāraḥ buddhe avecca ppasādena samannāgataḥ dhamme avecca ppasādena samannāgataḥ saṅghe avecca ppasādena samannāgataḥ ariya kantehi sīlehi samannāgataḥ

original: Ghaṭikāro kho, mahārāja, kumbhakāro dukkhe nikkaṅkho, dukkhasamudaye nikkaṅkho, dukkhanirodhe nikkaṅkho, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya nikkaṅkho.
analyzed: ghaṭikāraḥ kho mahā rāja kumbhakāraḥ dukkhe nikkaṅkhaḥ dukkha samudaye nikkaṅkhaḥ dukkha nirodhe nikkaṅkhaḥ dukkha nirodha gāminiyā paṭipadāya nikkaṅkhaḥ

original: Ghaṭikāro kho, mahārāja, kumbhakāro ekabhattiko brahmacārī sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo.
analyzed: ghaṭikāraḥ kho mahā rāja kumbhakāraḥ ekabhattikaḥ brahmacārī sīlavā kalyāṇa dhammo

original: Ghaṭikāro kho, mahārāja, kumbhakāro nikkhittamaṇisuvaṇṇo apetajātarūparajato.
analyzed: ghaṭikāraḥ kho mahā rāja kumbhakāraḥ nikkhitta maṇi suvaṇṇaḥ apeta jātarūpa rajataḥ

original: Ghaṭikāro kho, mahārāja, kumbhakāro pannamusalo na sahatthā pathaviṁ khaṇati.
analyzed: ghaṭikāraḥ kho mahā rāja kumbhakāraḥ panna musalaḥ na sahatthā pathavim khaṇati

original: Yaṁ hoti kūlapaluggaṁ vā mūsikukkaro vā taṁ kājena āharitvā bhājanaṁ karitvā evamāha:
analyzed: yam hoti kūla paluggam vā mūsi kukkaraḥ vā tam kājena āharitvā bhājanam karitvā evam āha

original: “ettha yo icchati taṇḍulapaṭibhastāni vā muggapaṭibhastāni vā kaḷāyapaṭibhastāni vā nikkhipitvā yaṁ icchati taṁ haratū”ti.
analyzed: ettha yaḥ icchati taṇḍula paṭibhastāni vā mugga paṭibhastāni vā kaḷāya paṭibhastāni vā nikkhipitvā yam icchati tam haratu uti

original: Ghaṭikāro kho, mahārāja, kumbhakāro andhe jiṇṇe mātāpitaro poseti.
analyzed: ghaṭikāraḥ kho mahā rāja kumbhakāraḥ andhe jiṇṇe mātā pitaraḥ posa iti

original: Ghaṭikāro kho, mahārāja, kumbhakāro pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
analyzed: ghaṭikāraḥ kho mahā rāja kumbhakāraḥ pañcannam orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam parikkhayā opapātiko tattha parinibbāyī an āvatti dhammo tasmā lokā

original: Ekamidāhaṁ, mahārāja, samayaṁ vegaḷiṅge nāma gāmanigame viharāmi.
analyzed: ekam id āha mahā rāja samayam vegaḷiṅge nāma gāma nigame viharāmi

original: Atha khvāhaṁ, mahārāja, pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena ghaṭikārassa
analyzed: atha khvā āha mahā rāja pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya yena ghaṭi kārassa

original: kumbhakārassa mātāpitaro tenupasaṅkamiṁ; upasaṅkamitvā ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa
analyzed: kumbhakārassa mātā pitaraḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa

original: mātāpitaro etadavocaṁ:
analyzed: mātā pitarau etat avoca

original: “handa ko nu kho ayaṁ bhaggavo gato”ti?
analyzed: handa kaḥ nu khalu ayam bhaggavaḥ gataḥ iti

original: “Nikkhanto kho te, bhante, upaṭṭhāko antokumbhiyā odanaṁ gahetvā pariyogā sūpaṁ gahetvā paribhuñjā”ti.
analyzed: nikkhantaḥ kho te bhante upaṭṭhākaḥ antokumbhiyāḥ odanam gahetvā pariyogā sūpam gahetvā paribhuñjāti

original: Atha khvāhaṁ, mahārāja, kumbhiyā odanaṁ gahetvā pariyogā sūpaṁ gahetvā paribhuñjitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamiṁ.
analyzed: atha khvā āha mahā rāja kumbhiyāḥ odanam gahetvā pariyogā sūpam gahetvā paribhuñjitvā uṭṭhāya āsanā pakkami

original: Atha kho, mahārāja, ghaṭikāro kumbhakāro yena mātāpitaro tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā mātāpitaro etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu mahā rāja ghaṭikāraḥ kumbhakāraḥ yena mātā pitaraḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā mātā pitaraḥ etat avoca

original: “ko kumbhiyā odanaṁ gahetvā pariyogā sūpaṁ gahetvā paribhuñjitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkanto”ti?
analyzed: kaḥ kumbhiyāḥ odanam gahetvā pariyogā sūpam gahetvā paribhuñjitvā uṭṭhāya āsanā pakkantaḥ iti

original: “Kassapo, tāta, bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho kumbhiyā odanaṁ gahetvā pariyogā sūpaṁ gahetvā paribhuñjitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkanto”ti?
analyzed: kassapaḥ tāta bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ kumbhiyāḥ odanam gahetvā pariyogā sūpam gahetvā paribhuñjitvā uṭṭhāya āsanā pakkantaḥ iti

original: Atha kho, mahārāja, ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa etadahosi:
analyzed: atha kho mahā rāja ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa etat ahosi

original: “lābhā vata me, suladdhaṁ vata me,
analyzed: lābhāḥ vata me su laddham vata me

original: yassa me kassapo bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho evaṁ abhivissattho”ti.
analyzed: yassa me kassapaḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ evam

original: Atha kho, mahārāja, ghaṭikāraṁ kumbhakāraṁ aḍḍhamāsaṁ pītisukhaṁ na vijahati, sattāhaṁ mātāpitūnaṁ.
analyzed: atha khalu mahā rāja ghaṭikāram kumbhakāram aḍḍha māsam pīti sukham na vijahati sattāham mātā pitūn

original: Ekamidāhaṁ, mahārāja, samayaṁ tattheva vegaḷiṅge nāma gāmanigame viharāmi.
analyzed: ekam id āha mahā rāja samayam tatthā iva vegaḷiṅge nāma gāma nigame viharāmi

original: Atha khvāhaṁ, mahārāja, pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena ghaṭikārassa
analyzed: atha khvā āha mahā rāja pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya yena ghaṭi kārassa

original: kumbhakārassa mātāpitaro tenupasaṅkamiṁ; upasaṅkamitvā ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa
analyzed: kumbhakārassa mātā pitaraḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa

original: mātāpitaro etadavocaṁ:
analyzed: mātā pitarau etat avoca

original: “handa ko nu kho ayaṁ bhaggavo gato”ti?
analyzed: handa kaḥ nu khalu ayam bhaggavaḥ gataḥ iti

original: “Nikkhanto kho te, bhante, upaṭṭhāko anto kaḷopiyā kummāsaṁ gahetvā pariyogā sūpaṁ gahetvā paribhuñjā”ti.
analyzed: nikkhantaḥ kho te bhante upaṭṭhākaḥ antar kaḷopiyā kummāsam gahetvā pariyogā sūpam gahetvā paribhuñjāti

original: Atha khvāhaṁ, mahārāja, kaḷopiyā kummāsaṁ gahetvā pariyogā sūpaṁ gahetvā paribhuñjitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamiṁ.
analyzed: atha khvā āha mahā rāja kaḷopiyā kummāsam gahetvā pariyogā sūpam gahetvā paribhuñjitvā uṭṭhāya āsanā pakkami

original: Atha kho, mahārāja, ghaṭikāro kumbhakāro yena mātāpitaro tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā mātāpitaro etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu mahā rāja ghaṭikāraḥ kumbhakāraḥ yena mātā pitaraḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā mātā pitaraḥ etat avoca

original: “ko kaḷopiyā kummāsaṁ gahetvā pariyogā sūpaṁ gahetvā paribhuñjitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkanto”ti?
analyzed: kaḥ kaḷopiyā kummāsam gahetvā pariyogā sūpam gahetvā paribhuñjitvā uṭṭhāya āsanā pakkantaḥ iti

original: “Kassapo, tāta, bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho kaḷopiyā kummāsaṁ gahetvā pariyogā sūpaṁ gahetvā paribhuñjitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkanto”ti.
analyzed: kassapaḥ tāta bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ kaḷopiyā kummāsam gahetvā pariyogā sūpam gahetvā paribhuñjitvā uṭṭhāya āsanā pakkantaḥ iti

original: Atha kho, mahārāja, ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa etadahosi:
analyzed: atha kho mahā rāja ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa etat ahosi

original: “lābhā vata me, suladdhaṁ vata me,
analyzed: lābhāḥ vata me su laddham vata me

original: yassa me kassapo bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho evaṁ abhivissattho”ti.
analyzed: yassa me kassapaḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ evam

original: Atha kho, mahārāja, ghaṭikāraṁ kumbhakāraṁ aḍḍhamāsaṁ pītisukhaṁ na vijahati, sattāhaṁ mātāpitūnaṁ.
analyzed: atha khalu mahā rāja ghaṭikāram kumbhakāram aḍḍha māsam pīti sukham na vijahati sattāham mātā pitūn

original: Ekamidāhaṁ, mahārāja, samayaṁ tattheva vegaḷiṅge nāma gāmanigame viharāmi.
analyzed: ekam id āha mahā rāja samayam tatthā iva vegaḷiṅge nāma gāma nigame viharāmi

original: Tena kho pana samayena kuṭi ovassati.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena kuṭī ovassati

original: Atha khvāhaṁ, mahārāja, bhikkhū āmantesiṁ:
analyzed: atha khvā aha mahā rāja bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “gacchatha, bhikkhave, ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa nivesane tiṇaṁ jānāthā”ti.
analyzed: gacchatha bhikkhave ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa nivesane tiṇam jānātha ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, mahārāja, te bhikkhū maṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: evam vutte mahā rāja te bhikkhū mama etat avocuḥ

original: “natthi kho, bhante, ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa nivesane tiṇaṁ, atthi ca khvāssa āvesane tiṇacchadanan”ti.
analyzed: na atthi kho bhante ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa nivesane atthi ca khvā assa āvesane tiṇa chadanan ti

original: “Gacchatha, bhikkhave, ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa āvesanaṁ uttiṇaṁ karothā”ti.
analyzed: gacchatha bhikkhave ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa āvesanam uttiṇam karotha ati

original: Atha kho te, mahārāja, bhikkhū ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa āvesanaṁ uttiṇamakaṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho te mahā rāja bhikkhū ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa āvesanam uttiṇamakasu

original: Atha kho, mahārāja, ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa mātāpitaro te bhikkhū etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: atha kho mahā rāja ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa mātā pitaraḥ te bhikkhū etat avocuḥ

original: “ke āvesanaṁ uttiṇaṁ karontī”ti?
analyzed: ke āvesanam uttiṇam karonti iti

original: “Bhikkhū, bhagini, kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa kuṭi ovassatī”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhū bhagini kassapassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa kuṭi ovassati iti

original: “Haratha, bhante, haratha, bhadramukhā”ti.
analyzed: haratha bhante haratha bhadra mukha ati

original: Atha kho, mahārāja, ghaṭikāro kumbhakāro yena mātāpitaro tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā mātāpitaro etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu mahā rāja ghaṭikāraḥ kumbhakāraḥ yena mātā pitaraḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā mātā pitaraḥ etat avoca

original: “ke āvesanaṁ uttiṇamakaṁsū”ti?
analyzed: ke āvesanam

original: “Bhikkhū, tāta, kassapassa kira bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa kuṭi ovassatī”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhū tāta kassapassa kira bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa kuṭi ovassati iti

original: Atha kho, mahārāja, ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa etadahosi:
analyzed: atha kho mahā rāja ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa etat ahosi

original: “lābhā vata me, suladdhaṁ vata me,
analyzed: lābhāḥ vata me su laddham vata me

original: yassa me kassapo bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho evaṁ abhivissattho”ti.
analyzed: yassa me kassapaḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ evam

original: Atha kho, mahārāja, ghaṭikāraṁ kumbhakāraṁ aḍḍhamāsaṁ pītisukhaṁ na vijahati, sattāhaṁ mātāpitūnaṁ.
analyzed: atha khalu mahā rāja ghaṭikāram kumbhakāram aḍḍha māsam pīti sukham na vijahati sattāham mātā pitūn

original: Atha kho, mahārāja, āvesanaṁ sabbantaṁ temāsaṁ ākāsacchadanaṁ aṭṭhāsi, na devotivassi.
analyzed: atha kho mahā rāja āvesanam sabbantam temāsam ākāsa chadanam aṭṭhāsi na deva utivassi

original: Evarūpo ca, mahārāja, ghaṭikāro kumbhakāro’ti.
analyzed: evarūpaḥ ca mahā rāja ghaṭikāraḥ kumbhakāraḥ iti

original: ‘Lābhā, bhante, ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa, suladdhā, bhante, ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa
analyzed: lābhā bhante ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa su laddhā bhante ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa

original: yassa bhagavā evaṁ abhivissattho’ti.
analyzed: yassa bhagavā evam abhivissatthaḥ ti

original: Atha kho, ānanda, kikī kāsirājā ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa pañcamattāni taṇḍulavāhasatāni pāhesi paṇḍupuṭakassa sālino tadupiyañca sūpeyyaṁ.
analyzed: atha kho ānanda kikī kāsi rājā ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa pañcamattāni taṇḍula vāha satāni pāhesi paṇḍupuṭakassa sālino tat upiyam ca sūpeyya

original: Atha kho te, ānanda, rājapurisā ghaṭikāraṁ kumbhakāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: atha kho te ānanda rāja purisāḥ ghaṭikāram kumbhakāram upasaṅkamitvā etat avocuḥ

original: ‘imāni kho, bhante, pañcamattāni taṇḍulavāhasatāni kikinā kāsirājena pahitāni paṇḍupuṭakassa sālino tadupiyañca sūpeyyaṁ.
analyzed: imāni kho bhante pañcamattāni taṇḍula vāha satāni kikinā kāsi rājena pahitāni paṇḍupuṭakassa sālino tat upiyam ca

original: Tāni, bhante, paṭiggaṇhathā’ti.
analyzed: tāni bhante paṭiggaṇhatha ati

original: ‘Rājā kho bahukicco bahukaraṇīyo.
analyzed: rājā kho bahu kiccaḥ bahu karaṇīyaḥ

original: Alaṁ me.
analyzed: alam me

original: Raññova hotū’ti.
analyzed: raññā uva hotu uti

original: Siyā kho pana te, ānanda, evamassa:
analyzed: siyā kho pana te ānanda evam assa

original: ‘añño nūna tena samayena jotipālo māṇavo ahosī’ti.
analyzed: aññaḥ nūna tena samayena jotipālaḥ māṇavaḥ ahosi iti

original: Na kho panetaṁ, ānanda, evaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
analyzed: na kho pana itas ānanda evam

original: Ahaṁ tena samayena jotipālo māṇavo ahosin”ti.
analyzed: aham tena samayena jotipālaḥ māṇavaḥ

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamano āyasmā ānando bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
analyzed: āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandi iti

original: Ghaṭikārasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ paṭhamaṁ.
analyzed: ghaṭikāra suttam niṭṭhitam paṭhama
